name: 2025 4th International Conference on Power Electronics and Control Engineering
content: PUBLICATION: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by the conference scientific committees and accepted papers will be published in either of the journals below based on their topics. ※ International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications (IJEETC, ISSN: 2319-2518 (Online)) Abstract and Indexing: Scopus (since 2017), Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. ※ International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR, ISSN: 2278-0149 (Online)) Abstract and Indexing: ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
